text: Serena libre is an alcoholic cocktail made of pisco and Chilean papaya juice that was created during the 1990s in the bars of La Serena, Chile. It mixes the juice of a Chilean papaya and pisco, typical products of the Coquimbo Region.Martita.cl Mix over ice: * 3 measures of papaya juice * 1 measure of Pisco liquor * Powdered sugar to taste. ==References== Category:Pisco Category:Chilean alcoholic drinks Category:Cocktails with brandy Category:Coquimbo Region
title: Serena libre
